documentation.description: Entries listed here will be removed from the project's composer.json file.
documentation.requirement: Only works on Webtourismus dev server. Only works with webtourismus/drupal-starterkit projects.
documentation.usage: Add thing to remove to 'remove' section in this file. Then run 'robo sync' inside the target project directory.
documentation.limitation: Currently only patches are supported. Might be extented in the future (e.g. repo entries).

example_vendor/example_package.example_key: When running 'robo sync', the patch with the key 'example_key' will be removed from the composer.json patches section of example_vendor/example_package.
